definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 通用性强是其主要优势。

sentences.english: The experimental results have verified the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm, and it is generalizable to 3D objects displayed in meshes model.
sentences.chinese: 该绘制算法对以网格模型显示三维物体具有通用性。

sentences.english: This system is characteristic of distinctive universality and highly reliability.
sentences.chinese: 陔系统具有突出的通用性和高可信赖的特点。

sentences.english: With the NEMA standard flange connection, keep the good universal.
sentences.chinese: 标准的法兰连接，通用性好。

sentences.english: J23 series open-type inclinable press is widely applicable.
sentences.chinese: J23系列开式可倾压力机具有较强的通用性。

sentences.english: But the net is losing some of its openness and universality.
sentences.chinese: 但是互联网的确正在丧失他的开放性以及通用性。

sentences.english: They are superior in "versatility" as compared to a gate or globe valve.
sentences.chinese: 与闸阀或截止阀相比，蝶阀具有更好的“通用性”。

sentences.english: This catenary control sys-tem is universal and transplantable.
sentences.chinese: 该垂度控制系统具有通用性和可移植性。

sentences.english: But that versatility masks one of its most powerful tools.
sentences.chinese: 但这种通用性掩盖了它的一种最强大的工具。

sentences.english: The reusability of these report files is bad.
sentences.chinese: 报表文件的通用性较差。

sentences.english: The model is pertinent to the real condition of power system and has the characteristics of great generality and flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 个模型体系的通用性和可扩充性，具有较强的灵活性。

sentences.english: The system owns high potency and general-purpose characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 具有高效性和一定程度的通用性。

sentences.english: The traditional fire table has defects in accuracy and generality.
sentences.chinese: 传统射表在风修精度和通用性等方面存在不足。

sentences.english: This makes it more versatile than Virtualdub.
sentences.chinese: 这使得它比VirtualDub更具有通用性。

sentences.english: The Stepping Sequential Controller is a type of general-purpose device.
sentences.chinese: 步进式顺序控制器是一种通用性装置。

definition: to use anywhere, anytime (card, ticket etc)/to be used by everyone (language, textbook etc)/(of two or more things) interchangeable
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
